reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: UNITWIN Programme and UNESCO HEI Network for SDG implementation

description.narrative:
To take advantage of the vital role that higher education plays in the economic and socio-cultural development of societies, and to assist Member States achieve the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, in particular SDG4, this work plan is oriented to support international interuniversity cooperation to advance knowledge and practice in higher education.
The UNITWIN programme will build on the outcomes of the 25th Anniversary event convened during the General Conference 2017 and identify a thematic area within the context of SDG4 to enhance the collaboration for the Chairs and Networks to collectively address concrete areas to meet the goal, with an emphasis on mobilizing inter-university cooperation in this area in Africa and developing countries.

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
